extendedIngredients.name: cheddar cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 6oz pkgs. of Annie's Homegrown Shells and Real Aged Cheddar Macaroni and Cheese

extendedIngredients.name: chicken
extendedIngredients.originalString: 6 oz chicken, cooked, diced into small pieces

extendedIngredients.name: hot sauce
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 - 6 tbsp. hot sauce ( I used Franks Hot Sauce)

recipes.title: Yum Yum Wednesday â€“ Buffalo Chicken Mac & Cheese

winePairing.pairingText: Macaroni and Cheese works really well with Lambrusco, Chenin Blanc, and Riesling. With rich, cheesy mac & cheese you'll want to cleanse the palate with something crisp and acidic. We recommend Chenin Blanc, Riesling, or dry Lambrusco if you're in the mood for a red. The PRONTO Lambrusco Secco with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 20 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: PRONTO Lambrusco Secco
productMatches.description: Crimson purple color. Aromas are rich with purple iris, clove and licorice. Medium-bodied, dry (secco), excellent concentration, rich finish, abundant fruit, dry. This wine offers complexity and richness on the palate.

recipes.instructions: Bring 12 cups of water to a boil, stir in pasta. Bring to a boil and cook for 8 - 10 minutes or until done; stirring occasionally. Drain Pasta. Add 6 tablespoons of milk into a sauce pan and sprinkle cheese from each packet and hot sauce over milk, stir until combined. Add cooked pasta and chicken, stir until pasta and chicken are completely coated.

steps.step: Bring 12 cups of water to a boil, stir in pasta. Bring to a boil and cook for 8 - 10 minutes or until done; stirring occasionally.
Add 6 tablespoons of milk into a sauce pan and sprinkle cheese from each packet and hot sauce over milk, stir until combined.
Add cooked pasta and chicken, stir until pasta and chicken are completely coated.
